name: HULL
description:
You were watching TV when suddenly your neighbour contacts you, and not to invite you to dinner...

A horde of monsters from hell has invaded Earth! But don't worry, the military is coming to rescue you!

See if you can reach the end in this modern take of the 90's classics!

Made by Team.FOX with <3

CONTROLS:

WASD - Walk

Left Mouse - Shoot

Scroll Wheel / 1,2,3 - Switch weapon

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Submission for SCREAM JAM 2021
